name: Vance Hamilton
text: Ben over a year since I tried them toppings swimming in sauce 10 dollar pizza 15 dollar with delivery. Just go to marcos.

name: alicia alexander
text: the food was amazing. this place has an awesome atmosphere.

name: Eileen Moore
text:
Picked up a pizza to go and it came out piping hot and the young lady who brought it to my car was very polite and nice.   Pizza was delicious!!
Thank you!!

name: Charles Priovolos
text: Just received my pizza from the new location and I am surprised to say everything was excellent and perfectly cooked.  I had more pizzas that than the one pictured below but I just wanted to show how excellent it looks because I honestly have never seen that. I hope this service stays with the new location.

name: CONGOBUSINESS TV
text: I had the $5 dollars lunch and it was a great value. The personal pizza is large enough to fill you out and it comes with your choice of a drink. The staff seemed shy but very friendly whey I engaged them!

name: Chris McCann
text:
Pizza was great! Like it always is!
My wife and ate in the restaurant.
If you want pepper flakes or Parmesan? â€¦More

name: Channell Jones
text: I'm a dinning services manager at Flower Mound Assisted Living. And I called this location and for a donation of 5 heart shaped pizzas for Valentine's day. I was told yes. But when I went to finalize the order I was told he wouldn't have â€¦More

name: Aaron Richard
text: New Pizza Hut location has a dining room and for lunch they have a combo deal that includes a 1 topping 9" pizza and 20oz soft drink for just $5 everyday 11am to 4pm.  Lots better then the old place!

name: Jordan Hall
text: Definitely better customer service than the other Lewisville location. I was a little upset at how little toppings they put on the pizza though. If you combined the customer service at this location with the pizza making skills of the other location you would have the perfect pizza hut.

name: Araceli Gonzalez
text:
This location still have pick up and delivery service.
Nice!ðŸ˜€ðŸ¤©

name: Arian Stanley
text: I eat here a lot since I work in the area. I like how the service is always fantastic and they keep the spot neat consistently. Rates are affordable and they serve large portions.

name: Royal Conley
text: They serve big portions and for reasonable prices. very nice employees. Will visit again.

name: Inkedbluemama 22
text: This was my first time ordering at this location and I received excellent customer service.  I ordered online and drove to the store to pick up my pizzas.  When I went inside, I was carrying my infant and had my young daughter with me. â€¦More

name: Alicia Lindeman
text: Pizza's always fresh and hot. The wait time is your normal wait time for a pizza. The dine in area is very clean and spacious. The staff is friendly and always answers questions when asked.

name: Grace Alvarez
text: The food was really good. I will definitely go there again.

name: Sheila K Baker
text: Pizza was cold and over an hour (when I ordered they said 40-45 minutes). HORRIBLE.

name: Stank-E- Gamer
text: Love the thin crust pizza

name: Donald Tittle
text: Staff was curiously absent from the restaurant for at least 5 minutes. I could have walked off with multiple orders. Then as I pulled away I counted at least 5 employees who â€˜suddenlyâ€™ appeared. I paid extra money for additional pepperoni â€¦More

name: ToYAH
text: Pizza took an hour to arrive and was cold. No Bueno.

name: Sarah Billingsley
text: Upgraded delivery pizza hut, with dine in area but not full restaurant. Staff was courteous and helpful and the pizza was excellent.

name: cowboy 84
text: Clean location great food and their 5 dollar menu is awesome the staff are always friendly always make sure the customer is always taken care of.

name: jason beadle
text: Best pizza around and a great staff!
